name: spotcafe-build
description: SpotCafe web and server applications build

scripts.build: npm run --prefix ./web build:prod && npm run --prefix ./server ts:build && npm run --prefix ./server webpack:build
scripts.build-update: npm run --prefix ./web build:prod && npm run --prefix ./server ts:build && npm run --prefix ./server webpack:build-update

author: admin@computerclubsystem.com
